page.title: 02MARWOOD N. HOUSING
page.content: There are only two villages in the block,Milltown and Middle Marwood,each made up of about 25 houses,all very individual and with a garden.Small groups of houses (1_10) are dotted about the area. Most of these houses are detached dwellings.They are generally in a very good state of repair and although they may be very old most have modern amenities.However many people still have their own water supply and septic tank.Unless you have your own cylinders there is no mains gas.Nearly every house uses its chimney and although electricity and oil are used for cooking wood burners and open fires are used a great deal for heating the home.
